nodes.text: The Origami Yoda Files is a boxed set collecting the first four volumes of author Tom Angleberger's Origami Yoda young readers series. The set includes the stories The Strange Case of Origami Yoda, Darth Paper Strikes Back, The Secret of the Fortune Wookiee, and The Surprise Attack of Jabba the Puppett. It was released on October 1, 2013.
